channel.title: hike on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hike on Barefoot Rob

item.title: hiking day
item.description: 21:37 Sunday 19 April 2015 JST Great fun barefoot hiking today around Mt Mitake! Rohini joined the barefoot lifestyle and we clambored up some rocks, including up the back side! At the top, oops! I stubbed my toe.

item.title: cold hike
item.description: ##12:17am Sunday 22 March 2015 Here are notes I just found while cleaning up some e-junk. I think they are from a hike, but I’m surprised they’re labeled 21 December; wouldn’t that be too cold??? ##11:42am 21 Dec 2013 Legs tired. Ready to quit 2But not yet 1/3rd finished ##13:06. 1/3rd finished, but are going back on a bus that arrives in 1.5 hours. Lunch now
